p: Between August 1, 2007 and October 3, 2014, 3811 HIV-diagnosed female and male patients were recorded in the database ( Fig 2). The following groups were excluded from analysis: patients recruited at the narcotics prison (N = 291); those below 15 years of age (N = 164); those having incomplete information on key event dates (N = 67); and those who were tested for HIV but never had characteristics data collected (N = 26).
